title: Constructing Authentic Learning Environments for Science Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific theory knowledge and foundational learning design concepts
context.additional_context: Development of science instructional design competencies through team-based project execution in a smartphone-based environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze external materials (experiment videos, textbooks, assessment tools, etc.) reflecting real science classes to derive instructional design requirements.
Learners can develop feasible instructional design prototypes in science education contexts by collaborating with team members via LMS and mobile devices.
Learners can cultivate reflective practice skills by iteratively improving instructional materials based on peer and instructor feedback.

resources: Digital Content Library for Science Education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
